Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 93rd/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 93rd/Woodlawn, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 93rd/Woodlawn, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Woodlawn, Stony Island, 95th, over normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, Cottage Grove, 95th, over normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with wait times of up to 45 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 45 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Wood
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Beverly, 99th, Longwood and 103rd: due to, police activity near 103rd/Wood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Beverly, 99th, longwood, 103rd and over regular route, due to police activity near 103rd/Wood.

Allow extra travel time.
